title: Let's Read Together
story: Hi Lisa. How are you?  I'm fine. What are you doing? I'm reading a book. Really? All of it? No. Just this part. Who's that? It's Mary. She has a dog. Let's read it together.
summary: Two friends, Lisa and Mary, have a conversation about reading a book together.
image: Two children sitting side by side, each holding a book and smiling.
